lenders.name: The School of Spanish
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a real connection between what we are learning in class and what is going on in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are students of the Spanish language.
These are the standards for foreign language learning that we hope to meet through KIVA:

COMMUNICATION
Communicate in Languages Other Than English
Standard 1.2: Students understand and interpret written and spoken language on a variety of topics

CULTURES
Gain Knowledge and Understanding of Other Cultures
Standard 2.1: Students demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between the practices and perspectives of the culture studied
Standard 2.2: Students demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between the products and perspectives of the culture studied

CONNECTIONS
Connect with Other Disciplines and Acquire Information
Standard 3.1: Students reinforce and further their knowledge of other disciplines through the foreign language
Standard 3.2: Students acquire information and recognize the distinctive viewpoints that are only available through the foreign language and its cultures

COMPARISONS
Develop Insight into the Nature of Language and Culture
Standard 4.2: Students demonstrate understanding of the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied and their own.

COMMUNITIES
Participate in Multilingual Communities at Home & Around the World
Standard 5.1: Students use the language both within and beyond the school setting

lenders.name: OFS3-Bubbah
lenders.loan_because:
I like to contribute to women’s empowerment and their independency. Gender inequalities in developing societies inhibit economic growth and development. By giving women access to working capital and training, a program like KIVA helps women’s productive capacity to alleviate poverty. Moreover, evidence suggests that participation in microfinance programs such as KIVA may give women the means to escape from abusive relationships or limit abuse in their relationships. Working Women’s Forum found that 40.9 percent of its members who had experienced domestic violence stopped it because of their personal empowerment. 
I start investing in our future through KIVA, by investing the money collected by Bubbah the monkey, for late entry class penalty fee in people management skills course OFS3-Schlumberger, Nov-08- Sugarland. You can do it too. It is so easy and rewarding.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I used to work in the finance industry and understand the power of having money when you need it to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer. I write software for mobile phones. My work has taken me around the United States, China, and India. I think someday almost everyone in the world will have a mobile phone, which is a tiny personal computer.

lenders.name: Iain
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: money is made round to go round.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I believe helping people help them selves is the best path to overcoming poverty and the best aid anyone can give.
lenders.occupational_info: I match customers needs and wants to goods and services in a way that satisfies the customer and provides a profit to me or my employer.

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: want to see women further their lives in industry
lenders.occupational_info: im a sales woman and wait on customers and work with my husband and family in our business here in new england (usa)

lenders.name: Brent and Dakota
lenders.loan_because: We believe that individuals can make a difference in the world through simple actions.  All you have to do is decide to act.
lenders.occupational_info: Brent is carpenter who's work includes techniques, materials and designs that are consciously chosen to leave a lighter impact on the planet.  Dakota implements community-based programs to encourage the wise use of water resources so there is enough to go around now and for future generations.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to be in a position to help those in need.

lenders.name: Missions Minded
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others become self-sufficient in the developing world.  What is usually a little money for us can do so much good elsewhere in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have a particular interest in the needs of widows, orphans and single women/ men with dependents.

I would like to work with other like minded people to pool funds and direct giving to people in Kenya; some of the post-soviet states and/or South America. If you are interested in joining a team to fund projects in these areas please join KanadaKares4Kiva.  Team members are also free to designate loans to any of their own areas of interest in keeping with Kiva's philosophy.  I hope to see you soon!

For some of my other charitable interests please see

lenders.name: Norm
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone get that goat!

lenders.name: Pedro Jose
lenders.loan_because: Creo que la mejor ayuda es ofrecer una oportunidad más que un donativo; porque  quién la recibe se esfuerza en aprovecharla, ayudandose así mismo a no caer en el circulo vicioso del victimismo. El sistema de microcréditos ofrece esta oportunidad.

lenders.name: Marikke
lenders.loan_because: Let's see, if micro-credits work better than traditional development aid.

lenders.name: Anastasia
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy to now that I am able to help other people help themselves.

lenders.name: Kieran
lenders.loan_because: for the cost of a couple of daily lunches I can help empower someone to build a business which improves their quality of life.

lenders.name: Sylvie
lenders.loan_because:
Le hasard m' a fait naître à un endroit confortable, mais capable de réfléchir. 
Tuvo la suerte de nacer en un lugar confortable.

lenders.name: serafino
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to and, instead of simply donate bread..., it is more useful to help build a business that feeds over time,
lenders.occupational_info: explain to employers how to protect workers from risks of accidents at work

lenders.name: Marcy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help spread hope around the world.

lenders.name: Mackenzie
lenders.loan_because: people are people are people are people and we get by with a little help from our friends.

lenders.name: Kohinoor
lenders.loan_because: I find this is a great idea
lenders.occupational_info: I create programs for computers and Internet

lenders.name: Amatullaah
lenders.loan_because: "Who is he that will lend to Allâh a goodly loan, then (Allâh) will increase it manifold to his credit (in repaying), and he will have (besides) a good reward (i.e. Paradise)". (Al-Hadid 57:11)

lenders.name: Camilla Sieljaks
lenders.loan_because: It is capacity-building!
lenders.occupational_info: Government administration

lenders.name: BiG
lenders.loan_because: we're in it together...it takes all kinds ^^

lenders.name: Andy & Ally
lenders.loan_because:
Andy: I'm a compassionate capitalist.
Ally:  We are excited to loan because we have been blessed by the success of Andy's small business and we want to share that feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: Andy runs a growing internet network that includes many sites from www.dumblaws.com to www.bimmershops.com.  Ally manages construction projects, mostly building or repairing roads for the City of Indio, California.

lenders.name: c-h-m
lenders.loan_because: Supporting  people who have a dream to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to hear people who has psychical difficulties.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: People helping themselves is the most effective means of progress.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to end poverty is to empower people. I believe we have a responsibility to each other.

lenders.name: olivia
lenders.loan_because: i like to see other people have a happy life.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and read. I like to goof around in the back yard.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should help people help themselves.  They have the pride of ownership and success.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired as a manager and now work on my ranch and volunteer in organizations that help children and the Montagnard People of Vietnam.

lenders.name: helen
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Raul
lenders.loan_because: I believe that providing resources for entrepreneurs is the best way to start a virtuous circle impacting not only the entrepreneurs but also the society around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies to indentify and face risks and oportunities related to the impact of the Internet

lenders.name: Jean-Yves
lenders.loan_because:
Faire mentir l'adage : on ne prête qu'aux riches.
Make the proverb lie: we give only to the rich.

lenders.name: catherine
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a practical and intelligent way to improve the situation of many individuals
lenders.occupational_info: I judge the difficulties between the french administration and all the persons ; my part is to control the respect of the human rights by  the adminsitration

lenders.name: Leigh
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that Kiva allows people to empower people who have been powerless.  It gives individuals an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work  at a non profit high school.  I empower teenagers who are typically left behind in our public school system.  I help prepare them for college and careers.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help and I do appreciate Kiva's lending personalized program.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but still very active !

lenders.name: Michèle
lenders.occupational_info: I publish books and Cds for children

lenders.name: Rosa
lenders.loan_because: There is always enough money to share some of it with people in need.

lenders.name: Patina
lenders.loan_because: People just need to be given a chance to make a difference for themselves.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior in high school and on my way to college. I hope to one day work in areas of international relations, social justice or human rights.

lenders.name: Franco & Diane
lenders.loan_because: I know together we can make a difference.

lenders.name: Eliana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the purpose of my life is to give help others achieve their best.
lenders.occupational_info: Just one word...challeging.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe that my 25$ can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my 3 kids ages 8, 6 and 6.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I know this will help bring financial security to families across the word. This is an opportunity to connect to other working women and help where I am able. I give all credit to God for he continues to bless me so I want to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a RN on a Burn and Wound Unit. I   help clients find holistic health and contentment.

lenders.name: Al K
lenders.loan_because: It's great way to support people trying to improve their lives and that of their families.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Kia ora - I have been lucky in my life with a wonderful wife and family, doing the things that I love, and having friends that I cherish.  I hope by helping someone else that they may also be happy in their lives and family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a (now retired from the sea) commercial fisherman/marine science professional who works mainly in Antarctic areas (very often in ice).  I am involved in fisheries science and management with a particular interest in high latitude (Antarctic) fisheries.  I have worked at times in many of the southern hemisphere seas and have a particular desire to help others in the fishing industry in all countries; particularly those who value what we have and desire to pass on the resource to future generations in a better state than it is now.   I also farm the steep hillsides of my home raising mainly highland cattle. I also have a strong desire to help others who raise cattle sustainably for food.

lenders.name: Melissa & Mike
lenders.loan_because: everyone can use a helping hand at one point or another. We know that there are people in the world that have life tougher than we do. We'd like to help eliminate the poverty and inequality.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of students age 8-9. I teach reading, math, and social studies. My husband is a geologist. He works with natural gas and oil exploration.

lenders.name: Katja
lenders.loan_because: I have the possibility to help others. We are all the same.

lenders.name: Jerome
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people setting up & develop business to make a difference in the world, realise their dream and live better. Being entrepreneur is a wonderfull experience and a real challenge that often need external advise and/or help.
lenders.occupational_info: I create innovative products and services in the telecom, Internet and entertainment industry by working with partners in an open and co-development framework.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people while giving them something that will better their future
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Augustana College in the United States. I am studying History, Philosophy, and Government here. I am currently studying abroad in Suva Fiji
